title: Alternative provisions as to annual and final meetings in case of insolvency
content: 274. Where section 271 has effect, sections 282 and 283 shall apply to the winding up to the exclusion of sections 272 and 273, as if the winding up were a creditors' voluntary winding up and not a members' voluntary winding up: 227 insolvency. Provided that the liquidator shall not be required to summon a meeting of creditors under the said section 282 at the end of the first year from the commencement of the winding up, unless the meeting held under the said section 271 is held more than three months before the end of that year. Provisions applicable to a Creditors' Voluntary Winding Up Provisions applicable to a creditorsâ€™ winding up.
